backend/main.mo: Main backend actor managing user profiles, checklist submissions, and admin-gated queries with storage and authorization mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that copies checklist entries and user profiles from the old canister state to the new one without modification.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and global styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and root layout handling identity changes and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding and logout button that clears identity and query cache before redirecting.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing header, main content region, and footer.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureMod: Camera modal using useCamera hook to start/stop the camera, capture photos, and show camera-related errors.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistItemCar: Displays a checklist item with optional photo preview and opens a camera capture modal to add or retake a photo.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting the user to enter and save their name, with form handling and disabled states during saving.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminAuthorization: Checks whether the current user has admin privileges using the backend actor and caches the result.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActor.ts: Wraps useActor to provide readiness, error handling, health checks, and retry logic for backend actor usage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/logout functionality, identity loading, and status management via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, checklist entries, and admin-only data with backend error normalization and health checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark glassmorphism theme variables, global styles, and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Displays admin-only list of checklist submissions with filtering, error handling, and authorization checks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSubmissionDetail: Shows detailed information for a single checklist submission with admin authorization and backend-loading states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginChoice.tsx: Handles user/admin login flow using Internet Identity with routing, error states, and role-based redirects.
frontend/src/pages/UserChecklist.tsx: Allows users to complete a checklist, capture photos, save profiles, and submit entries to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Empty file placeholder for admin session utilities.
frontend/src/utils/backendErrors.ts: Provides functions to classify, normalize, and detect backend and network errors for userâ€‘friendly messaging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and removing parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, known issues, existing features, and pending feature requests.
